content:
Guidelines for Creating Support Holidays

Holidays let you specify dates and times your customer support team is unavailable. There are a few guidelines to keep in mind:

You can associate up to 1000 holidays with each set of business hours.

In Business Hours setup, use Create New Holiday to define a custom holiday.

Holidays automatically acquire the time zone of the associated business hours.

Only add business hours marked as Active to holidays.

Holiday names donâ€™t need to be unique.

Report results do not currently take holidays into account.

If scheduling a holiday to recur on a specific day of every month, it will only recur on months with that specific day.

To recur on the last day of every month, choose "last" from the On day of every month drop-down list.

All users can view holidays via the API.
title: Service Cloud Holiday Guidelines
